Question: Which statement about EMR security is incorrect?
Answer Option 1: You can SSH into your cluster nodes
Answer Option 3: Apache Ranger is packaged within EMR
Answer Option 6: There are two security groups assigned between your different cluster nodes
Explanation: If you choose to use Ranger, it must be installed externally from your EMR cluster. Recommended read: https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/big-data/best-practices-for-securing-amazon-emr/
